snippet.title: Vertex Overstates Cystic Fibrosis Drug Benefit
snippet.description:
Vertex Overstates Cystic Fibrosis Drug Benefit
By Adam Feuerstein 11:02 AM EDT 05/29/12
"Misinterpretation" of phase II data leads Vertex to concede that fewer patients benefited from its two-drug cystic fibrosis therapy.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11557112/1/vertex-overstates-cystic-fibrosis-drug-benefit.html

snippet.title: Vertex Wins Early Approval of Cystic Fibrosis Drug
snippet.description:
Vertex Wins Early Approval of Cystic Fibrosis Drug
By Adam Feuerstein 01:39 PM EST 01/31/12
Vertex's Kalydeco is the first therapy to treat an underlying genetic cause of cystic fibrosis.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11392155/1/vertex-wins-early-approval-of-cystic-fibrosis-drug.html

snippet.title: Vertex Motors Down Cystic Fibrosis Highway
snippet.description:
Vertex Motors Down Cystic Fibrosis Highway
By Adam Feuerstein 06:57 AM EDT 07/30/13
The first of several studies aimed at expanding use of Kalydeco is successful.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11992824/1/vertex-motors-down-cystic-fibrosis-highway.html

snippet.title: Vertex: Two-Drug Cystic Fibrosis Therapy Improves Lung Function
snippet.description:
Vertex: Two-Drug Cystic Fibrosis Therapy Improves Lung Function
By Adam Feuerstein 09:57 AM EDT 05/07/12
Vertex plans to start a phase III study soon; if approved, the two-drug therapy could treat half of cystic fibrosis patients worldwide.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11523379/1/vertex-two-drug-cystic-fibrosis-therapy-improves-lung-function.html

snippet.title: Vertex's Roadmap to $10 Billion in Cystic Fibrosis Drug Sales
snippet.description:
Vertex's Roadmap to $10 Billion in Cystic Fibrosis Drug Sales
By Adam Feuerstein 09:00 AM EDT 06/11/13
Combinations of various Vertex drugs could benefit 90% of cystic fibrosis patients.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11946839/1/vertexs-roadmap-to-10-billion-in-cystic-fibrosis-drug-sales.html

snippet.title: Problems Found With Insmed's Analysis of Arikace Cystic Fibrosis Study
snippet.description:
Problems Found With Insmed's Analysis of Arikace Cystic Fibrosis Study
By Adam Feuerstein 07:43 AM EDT 10/22/13

snippet.description:

snippet.title: Vertex Readies Late-Stage Cystic Fibrosis Drug Studies
snippet.description:
Vertex Readies Late-Stage Cystic Fibrosis Drug Studies
By Adam Feuerstein 06:54 PM EST 02/26/13
If results are positive, the combination of VX-809 and Kalydeco could be filed with FDA next year.
